channel.title: Pimpscape runserver, putting server up
channel.description:
ok i downloaded godz v2 which is another server download but i couldent make mods or admins on it it didnt work for some reason, so ive downloaded pimpscape now but when i try to put the server up it puts me to hybridscape not pimpscape what should i do?
EDIT: dont go on about how to make players admin and mod i know fully how to do this lol...
can anyone help, Thanks :)

@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I did o.O but now I know better but it’s all good! I read what you put totally wrong… lol.

item.title: Pimpscape runserver, putting server up
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“rw master, post:7, topic:74966”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=110097.msg1098884#msg1098884 date=1175835579]

log on to your ham ip not 127.0.0.1
[/quote]I believe you are wrong about that… Maybe I’m wrong because I don’t use Hamachi but I would guess that you have to connect to 127.0.0.1 just like No-IP because only other people should connect using the Hamachi IP, Hamachi is used for other people to connect to your computer. Confusing, I know. lol

Slave do you even know how to code dont post thing you arnt sure about the code 127.0.0.1 is for hybrid scape you own code is for yourself and the servers you make so other people can get on …[/quote]Oh, sorry! I totally missed what he said lol… I thought he said something majorly different, my mistake.

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape runserver, putting server up
item.dc:creator: @_haydz :.:.:haydz:.:.:
item.description:
@_haydz wrote:

well up the tope theres

file blah blah blah and so on

click file and then click new port

type in the port

for e.g

username: haza
password:******
server ip:5.142.20.245

then down the bottem it will say new port

[11:05:50] Port changed to 43594
[11:05:52]
[11:05:52] Logging into (haza, *****)
[11:05:52] Your UID is: 17208756
[11:06:16]

Read full topic
